name: decopin-cli
description: Next.js App Router風のファイルベースCLIビルダー

scripts.build: tsc && npm run build:app && npm run build:prod
scripts.dev:build-all: npm run build && npm run build:app
scripts.dev:regen: npx tsx src/cli.ts build --app-dir app --output-dir examples --cli-name cli --verbose
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && npm run build:app && npm run dev:regen && vitest run test/integration/
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build:prod && vitest run --exclude '**/integration/**'

author: yuyakinjo
